content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Plate Production Line at (-73.0)
Consists of two stone furnaces for smelting iron ore:
- First stone furnace at position (3.0, -73.0)
- Second stone furnace at position (5.0, -73.0)
Both furnaces are operational, containing coal as fuel and processing iron ore into iron plates. Each furnace currently has:
- 24 coal units as fuel
- 13 iron ore units as input
- 10 iron plates as output

ERROR TIPS
No errors have occurred during the execution of these steps. The agent has successfully:
- Crafted and placed furnaces
- Added appropriate fuel and resources
- Extracted products from furnaces
